content.question: Which of the following additions to the experimental design will best help test whether the observed habitat preferences were the result of competition between species?

choices.label: Placing two individuals from the same population together inside the enclosure
Introducing different types of plants into the enclosure together with the snakes
Doubling the number of repetitions for the experimental treatment with T. atratus alone
Repeating the investigation with an enclosure that is twice as long as the original

content.answer: Placing two individuals from the same population together inside the enclosure

skill.text: 3.D: Propose a new investigation based on an evaluation of the experimental design or evidence.
